column1:
SQL_ERROR: DatabaseError: Execution failed on sql 'SELECT DISTINCT "customer"."id" AS "case_id", 
                "activity_id", 
                "timestamp" 
FROM (
    SELECT "customer"."id", 
           "invoice"."creation_date" AS "timestamp", 
           "invoice"."id" AS "activity_id" 
    FROM "customer" 
    JOIN "invoice" ON "customer"."id" = "invoice"."customer"
    UNION
    SELECT "customer"."id", 
           "order"."creation_date" AS "timestamp", 
           "order"."id" AS "activity_id" 
    FROM "customer" 
    JOIN "order" ON "customer"."id" = "order"."customer"
    UNION
    SELECT "customer"."id", 
           "shipment"."creation_date" AS "timestamp", 
           "shipment"."id" AS "activity_id" 
    FROM "customer" 
    JOIN "shipment" ON "customer"."id" = "shipment"."customer"
    UNION
    SELECT "customer"."id", 
           "payment"."creation_date" AS "timestamp", 
           "payment"."id" AS "activity_id" 
    FROM "customer" 
    JOIN "invoice" ON "customer"."id" = "invoice"."customer"
    JOIN "payment_line" ON "invoice"."id" = "payment_line"."invoice"
    JOIN "payment" ON "payment_line"."payment" = "payment"."id"
) AS events;': no such column: customer.id
